help-file.title: MANA
help-file.content: A number of classes on Duris still use the mana system (rather than the memorize system). What this means is rather than praying or memorizing for spell slots, each spell takes a specific number of mana to cast. If the caster runs out of mana, or exceeds him/herself when casting a spell, he/she will pass out for a short period of time.
